namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.CodeGenerator
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.CodeGenerator namespace contains classes for generating code and sql scripts for the DomainObjects framework.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding namespace contains classes and interfaces for 2-way data binding of user controls to domain objects.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Design
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Design namespace contains classes for design time support for 2-way data binding of user controls to domain objects.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.PropertyTypes
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.PropertyTypes namespace contains classes that provide meta information about properties needed for 2-way data binding of user controls to domain objects.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Web
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Web namespace contains web controls to be used for binding user controls to domain objects in an ASP.NET environment.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Web.Design
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Web.Design namespace contains classes for design time support for controls in the Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ObjectBinding.Web namespace.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ConfigurationLoader
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.ConfigurationLoader namespace contains classes to be used for loading the configuration of the DomainObjects framework.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.DataManagement
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.DataManagement namespace contains interfaces and classes for managing relations between DomainObjects in the DomainObjects framework.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Mapping
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Mapping namespace contains interfaces and classes to describe the domain model of the DomainObjects framework.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence namespace contains interfaces and classes to persist domain objects.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence.Configuration
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence.Configuration namespace contains classes to describe the storage providers used for persisting DomainObjects.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence.Rdbms
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Persistence.Rdbms namespace contains classes to persist domain objects to relational databases.
Types or interfaces in this namespace are not intended to be used directly from an application.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Queries
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Queries namespace contains classes to execute queries against the StorageProviders.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Queries.Configuration
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects.Queries.Configuration namespace contains classes to describe the pre-defined queries from the configuration file.

namespace.name: Remotion.Data.DomainObjects
namespace.para: The Remotion.Data.DomainObjects namespace and its sub namespaces contain interfaces and classes to be used for building domain models that are persisted by the DomainObjects framework.
In the following, an overview is provided on the starting points for working with the Remotion.Data.DomainObjects namespace.

tr.td: Base class for all objects that are persisted by the framework.
Provides methods to execute queries within a ClientTransaction.

namespace.para: The following list shows namespaces that provide implementations of Remotion technologies for the DomainObjects framework.

tr.td: An implementation of interfaces for the DomainObjects framework.
An implementation of classes for the DomainObjects framework.
